entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assembly load error in Android app referencing another project referencing a DLL assembly #10154
  • Build error when using some packages on Android #10152
  • Blazor - customization for video tag #10151
  • Directory Not Found of DLL from .Net MAUI class library in folder Debug\net6.0-android\android-x64 #10150
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Bug] Generated PNG images not displaying #10149
    Backlog
  • CollectionView items layout is not changed when GridItemsLayout.Span is changed on iOS and Windows #10144
    Backlog
  • Allow mixed-content in MauiBlazorWebView #10141
  • Border doesn't redraw itself when properties changed on Windows #10138
    Backlog
  • About the maui project error after updating VS17.3.4 #10137

Closed

  • Maui-Blazor App With Android WebView 105.x Stops Responding #9882
    7.0-rc2
  • Android compilation broken again #10148
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] CollectionView EmptyView using View not appear #7151
  • FlyoutPage issues on macOS #6408
    7.0-rc2
  • Grid contained in a StackLayout doesn't render an image in the first column if it is set to GridLength.Auto #9713
  • Close, minimize, and maximize don't work #10089
  • Empty View not showing #10146
  • Android does not load System.ServiceModel.Primitives.dll #10139
  • Arrange on Layouts not respecting correctly the passed bounding Rect #7535
    7.0
  • Gesture in Label doesn't work #10135
  • Slider issues on Windows and macOS #9812
  • .Maui Static Web Asset Build issue #10106
  • Shell in WinUI layout bugged #9941
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI: Switching the App's MainPage multiple times leads to exception #9459
    Backlog
  • [Android] Updating MainPage with a NavigationPage does not display page content #7153
    Backlog
  • Resetting Window Page does not update UI #7275
    7.0-rc2
  • SearchBar focused event is not working on Android. #8872
    7.0-rc2
  • Using a compatibility renderer for button on iOS causes crash #8153
    Backlog
  • Pair to Mac failed with the error "The Xcode license status couldn't be verified because Xcode has not been found on the default location of the connected Mac..." #10140
  • Blazor Maui Apps Getting Stuck On Android Devices #10104
  • 'Tab' button does not work when shift button from last button #7064
    Backlog
  • Recyclerview support #6725
  • [Android] [Scenario Day] Wrong selection in list inside Shell #7251

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default #10153
    area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 7.0-rc2
  • [Windows] Detect StrokeDashArray Border collection changes #10145
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix crash using MainDisplayInfoChanged on page constructor #10093
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞
  • Fix layout and safe area on FlyoutPage #10083
    area/layout 🔲, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix cleanup up WebView code #10147
    platform/android 🤖, control-webview, 7.0-rc2
  • Simplify ShellItem Parenting #9221
    area/shell 🐢, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix root page swapping #9955
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, 7.0-rc2
  • [Android] Fix focused events in SearchBar #9918
    t/bug, area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0-rc2
  • Use the correct delegate #10142
    7.0-rc2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10136
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10114
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10117
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10116
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Modify Controls Methods to use interfaces #10127
    7.0-rc2

Updated

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10113
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Support Window.Frame on all platforms #10028
    7.0-rc2
  • Add visual state for PointerOver #10003
    area/Xaml </>, 7.0-rc2
  • [Essentials] Fixes IPreferences DateTime handling #9974
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Don't force the TextDirection on Android unless the content direction can't be determined #10132
    platform/android 🤖, area/localization
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.8 to 6.0.9 #10118
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix AdaptiveTriggers #9984
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, .NET 7 Planning
  • [Android] Fire Completed event using ReturnType.Search #9632
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0-rc2
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22451.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22452.2 #9922
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 7.0-rc2
  • Add release 6.0.536 #10129
    community ✨
